items.name: Veg Korma
items.description: Mix veggies cooked in yogurt based spiced gravy with cramalised onion and cashew with freshly ground spices topped with fresh cream
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Chicken Korma
items.description: Chicken cooked with caramalised onions, nuts, yogurt, ginger, garlic and other spices
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad

items.name: Whole Moong Idli
items.description: Whole mung beans soaked and blend into a batter with rice flour and steamed into cakes. Served with coconut chutney

items.name: Coconut Rice
items.description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked in ghee with cashew, curry leaves, dried chilli and fresh coconut, tempered with mustard seeds

items.name: Kerala Style Avail
items.description: Comforting dish from Kerala. Mix veggies cooked in coconut and yogurt based thick gravy tempered with spices and fresh curry leaves.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad + papad

items.name: Malabar Chicken Curry
items.description: Juicy chicken cooked with onion, ginger and garlic in creamy coconut milk based gravy with fresh curry leaves.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad + papad

items.name: Mumbai Street Style Frankie
items.description: Assorted veggies stir fried in spicy sauce and wrapped in flat bread with a spinkle of frankie masala and served with spicy red sauce.

items.name: Rasam Chicken Rice
items.description: A warm spicy tomato soup (rasam) cooked together with peppery chicken served with rice and papad

items.name: Theeyal
items.description: Aubergine curry from Kerala made in coconut based spice paste tempered with spices and curry leaves.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad + papad

items.name: Goan Fish Curry
items.description: Fish cooked with freshly made spice paste of onion, tamarind and red chillies
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + papad

items.name: Masala Uttapam
items.description: Rice batter pancake topped with onion, tomato, chillies and and spices. Served with coconut chutney

items.name: Tomato Rice
items.description: Rice cooked with onions and tomato and tempered with mustard seeds, peanuts and fresh curry leaves. Served with papad.

items.name: Mirchi Ka Salan
items.description: A popular curry from Hyderabad with variety of low heat chillies in tangy flavourful gravy made of onion, tomato, garlic and ginger and topped with fresh corriander
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad + papad

items.name: Ambur Chicken Briyani
items.description: South Indian style biryani from the region of Ambur. Chicken cooked with onion, tomato, whole spices and ginger-garlic paste; layered with fragrant basmati rice topped with fresh mint and coriander. Served with cucumber yogurt raita + papad.

items.name: Mumbai Masala Sandwitch
items.description: Mashed potato mixed with onions, chillies and spicy chutney stuffed between bread, topped with lots of cheese. Served with spicy green chutney and ketchup.

items.name: Puttu & Kadala Curry
items.description: A comforting meal made of steamed rice flour layered with coconut and served with spicy warm black chickpea curry

items.name: Guthi Bendakai
items.description: Stuffed okra dish from Andra Pradesh. Okra stuffed with spice mix and shallow fried and temperted with mustard, black gram and red chillies
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad

items.name: Maharashtrian Chicken Thali
items.description: A non-veg feast from the state of Maharashtra. 3 chicken dishes, one refreshing drink, koshimbir (spiced side salad), achar, papad, 2 chapati, rice.

items.name: Chicken Momos
items.description: Minced chicken dumplings served with spicy sauce.

items.name: Aloo Sabzi And Puri
items.description: Spicy warm potato curry served with fried Indian whole wheat bread

items.name: Veg Chowmein
items.description: Assorted veggies cooked together with rice and noodles with flavourful chinese sauces and aromatic spices.

items.name: Chicken Chowmein
items.description: Assorted veggies and chicken stir fried and cooked together with rice and noodles with flavourful chinese sauces and aromatic spices.

items.name: Sweet Potato Tikki
items.description: Spiced sweet potato patty shallow fried and served with spicy green chutney.

items.name: Besan Ka Cheela
items.description: Chickpea floured mixed with spices, onion, tomato and chilles and made into thick batter and cooked like a pancake. Served with tomato onion chutney on the side.

items.name: Panner Makhni
items.description: Indian cottage cheese in a creamy buttery gravy made with onion, tomato, cashew, ginger, garlic and spices topped with fresh cream and coriander
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Hyderabadi Murgh Ka Salan
items.description: Chicken curry cooked with fresh spice paste of sesame, chilli, peanuts, coconut and tamarind cooked with onion, ginger garlic paste, and lots of spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Egg Kathi Roll
items.description: A very famous street food from Kolkata. Flaky parothas with egg, pickled onions, cucumber and fresh spices. Served with a side of spicy green chutney.

items.name: Dhaba Style Dal Kichidi
items.description: Rice, lentils, onion, tomato, ginger, garlic & chillies pressure cooked together and tempered with different spices for a flavourful comforting taste. Served with papad.

items.name: Kathal Masala
items.description: Jackfruit cooked with onions, spices, ginger, garlic, chilles and fresh coriander
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Dhaniwal Korma
items.description: A delicious dish from the state of Kashmir. Lamb meat cooked with yogurt, ginger, garlic, coriander powder and other spices; slow cooked for a few hours.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad

items.name: Oats Rava Unniappam
items.description: A very healthy snack with oats, semolina, onion, ginger, chillies and carrots tempered with spices and made into small puffs. Served with coconut chutney

items.name: Kheema Pav
items.description: Minced chicken cooked with onions, tomato, green peas and spices topped with fresh garam masala and coriander for the zing. Served with 2 buns and green chutney

items.name: Oriya Ghanta Tarkari
items.description: This vegetarian dish hails from Odisha. Veggies cooked in a special five spice mix tempered with cumin, chilli and coriander.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Oriya Lamb Curry
items.description: Lamb curry with freshly made spice mix of onion, ginger, garlic, red chiili and whole spices cooked in mustard oil and caramalised onions.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Parsi Fried Lamb Cutlets
items.description: Minced lamb mixed with spices, onion and chillies coated with bread crumbs and shallow fried for the crispy layer and juicy meat inside. Served with spicy green chutney. (3 cutlets)

items.name: Pav Bhaji
items.description: Mix of different veggies boiled and cooked in a spicy flavourful gravy of onion, tomato and fresh pav bhaji masala topped with butter and fresh corriander served with 2 buns

items.name: Khatte Chole
items.description: Chickpea curry made with onion and tomato puree spiced with chilli, ginger and dry mango powder.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Tariwala Murg
items.description: Chicken thigh with drumsticks marinated with ginger-garlic paste and other spices cooked in flavourful gravy of onion and tomato. Topped with fresh coriander and garam masala.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Bread Pakoda
items.description: Mashed potato mixed with spices & chillies stuffed between bread slices dipped in chickpea batter and fried for a crispy outer layer. Served with spicy green chutney. (2 pakodas)

items.name: Hyderabadi Khatti Dal & Chawal
items.description: A deliciously simple dal from hyderabad with the tang of tamarind and the spice of dried red chillies. Served with steamed rice + papad

items.name: Bengali Shorshe Begun
items.description: A comforting dish from West Bengal. Aubergines cooked with mustard, green chiili and yoghurt curry.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Bengali Shorshe Mach
items.description: A traditional Bengali fish curry made with a base of fresh mustard paste and yogurt.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Gujarati Khaman Dhokla
items.description: Soft, fluffy and spongy savoury cake made with gram flour tempered with mustard seeds, chillis and served with some green chutney. (4 pieces)

items.name: Ajwain & Methi ka Paratha
items.description: Healthy and satisfying parathas made with carom seeds and dried fenugreek leaves mixed with other spices in whole wheat dough and flattened and cooked on a pan with ghee. Served with tomato onion chutney on the side. (2 parathas)

items.name: Paneer Biryani
items.description: Indian cottage cheese marinated with yogurt, chilli, turmeric, ginger garlic paste, biryani masala and cooked with fragrant basmati rice. Topped with fried onions, fresh coriander and mint leaves. Served with a yogurt dip + papad + achar.

items.name: Chettinad Chicken Biryani
items.description: An amazing biryani from Kerala made with a meledy of unique spices cooked with juicy chicken and fragrant basmati rice with freshly ground Chettinad spice paste and caramalised onions. Served with yogurt raita + achar + papad

items.name: Sabudana Thalipeet
items.description: Sago pearls soaked overnight, mixed with green chili, boiled potato and cumin and flattened and shallow fried till crisp. Served with sweetend yogurt. (3 thalipeet)

items.name: Sambar Rice
items.description: A comfort meal from the south of India. Lentils and veggies cooked together with tamrind, and freshly made sambar masala tempered with mustard seeds and curry leaves. Served with rice + papad
